data.title: International Atomic Energy Agency – Prize presentation
data.meta_description: The Nobel Peace Prize 2005 was awarded jointly to International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) and Mohamed ElBaradei "for their efforts to prevent nuclear energy from being used for military purposes and to ensure that nuclear energy for peaceful purposes is used in the safest possible way"
data.text:
International Atomic Energy Agency

Prize presentation

Your browser does not support the video tag.

Watch a video clip of Ambassador Yukiya Amano, Chairman of IAEA Board of Governors, receiving the Nobel Prize medal and diploma during the Nobel Peace Prize Award Ceremony at the Oslo City Hall in Norway, 10 December 2005.
